name: fds.js
description: App Toolkit for the Web3 Generation

scripts.test: npm run compile && TESTENV=noordung truffle test --network noordung
scripts.test-dev: npm run compile && TESTENV=test truffle test --network test
scripts.test-dev-inspect: npm run compile && TESTENV=test node --inspect ./node_modules/truffle/build/cli.bundled.js test --network=test
scripts.build: npm run compile && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run compile && webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js
scripts.analyse: npm run compile && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.analyse.js

author: significance
